General.Name: Hanshin Const
General.Description: HANSHIN Engineering & Construction Co., Ltd. operates as a general construction company in South Korea and internationally. The company constructs housings works, which include apartments; building works; civil works; electricity/plant works; and various projects, including residential houses, office buildings, mixed-use complexes, sports centers, highways, etc. HANSHIN Engineering & Construction Co., Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
